scripts.install: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.deploy: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
